#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
ll gcd(ll a,ll b){
 if(b==0)
 return a;
 else
 return gcd(b,a%b); 
}
int main(){
 int t;
 ll m,n,a,b,ans,total,g;
 cin>>t;
 while(t--){
  cin>>n>>m;
   a=n/2;
   b=m/2;
   ans=a*m+b*n-2*a*b;
   total=n*m;
   g=gcd(ans,total);
  cout<<(ans/g)<<"/"<<(total/g)<<endl;
 }
 return 0;
}
